Tyrone had $ 97$ marbles and Eric had $ 11$ marbles. Tyrone then gave some of his marbles to Eric so that Tyrone ended with twice as many marbles as Eric. How many marbles did Tyrone give to Eric?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 3 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 13 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 18 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 25 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 29$
